title: BofA's Stewart: Non-US Firms Looking to Invest Stateside
description: Wendy Stewart, president of Global Commercial Banking at Bank of America, discusses how international investors and middle-market companies are adapting their strategies in response to geopolitical and macroeconomic uncertainty. She speaks with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
